LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.label: Noyau IA de personnalité
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.description: Un noyau d'ordinateur hyper-avancé hébergeant une intelligence artificielle surhumaine. Dans son état isolé, le noyau demeure dormant. Installé dans une structure adéquate, en revanche, il peut devenir un esprit d'une puissance effrayante.
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.label: neurotrainer mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to train a specific skill. The dose is administered through the orbit of the eye. Once released into the brain, the mechanites quickly improve the subject's skills in a specific area, transmuting themselves into neural tissue as needed.
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.comps.1.useLabel: Use neurotrainer mech serum to learn {0}
LanguageData.MechSerumHealer.label: healer mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumHealer.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to heal health conditions. The mechanites will target and heal the single worst health condition affecting someone at any given time. Works even on health conditions that would otherwise be incurable. The mechanites can even transmute themselves into organic matter, forming new limbs or organs as needed.
LanguageData.MechSerumResurrector.label: resurrector mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumResurrector.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to resurrect the dead. Administered to a corpse soon after death, mechanites repair broken-down tissues and kickstart the body back to life. They are not always successful - sometimes, the resurrected will come back with brain damage, blindness, or progressive psychosis. Outcomes are better when the mechanites are administered sooner.
LanguageData.TechprofSubpersonaCore.label: techprof subpersona core
LanguageData.TechprofSubpersonaCore.description: A small AI core housing a low-grade subpersona specialized in teaching technology. When used, the AI will teach you one technology you don't know, instantly and for free. Can only be used once.
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.label: corne de thrumbo
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.description: Une corne de thrumbo. Le thrumbo est féroce, sa corne est très dure et inestimable dans la plupart des marchés. Ceci est un véritable trophée.
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.label: défense d'éléphant
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.description: Une défense d'éléphant. Très durable et précieuse. Arme mortelle, mais peu maniable.
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.1.label: base
